title: Italy Retail Sales YoY
description: Retail Sales in Italy increased 4.10 percent in September of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Retail Sales YoY in Italy averaged 6.09 percent from 1972 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 90.20 percent in December of 1973 and a record low of -40.90 percent in June of 1986. In Italy, the year-over-year change in Retail sales compares the aggregated sales of retail goods and services during a certain month to the same month a year ago. This page provides - Italy Retail Sales YoY - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: National Institute of Statistics (ISTAT)
